title: libsteam_api64: No such file or directory
body:
Getting an error after server setup when attempting to start:

Unable to load shared library 'steam_api64' or one of its dependencies. In order to help diagnose loading problems, consider setting the LD_DEBUG environment variable: libsteam_api64: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

sorry if I'm just dumb
author: JackOtsig

comments.body: You just have to rename libsteam_api.so to libsteam_api64.so. Thats on me, I'll update the build action to automatically do that!
